text: Charles or Charlie Watts may refer to: ==Sportspeople== * Charlie Watts (footballer) (1870–1924), English footballer * Charles Watts (cricketer, born 1894) (1894–1979), English cricketer * Charles Watts (cricketer, born 1905) (1905–1985), English cricketer == Other people == * Charles Watts (secularist) (1836–1906), English writer, publisher and secularist * Charles Albert Watts (1858–1946), his son, English editor, publisher and secularist * C. C. Watts (pastor) or Charles Cameron Watts (1895–1965), Australian Congregationalist minister * Charlie Watts (fascist) (1903–1971), member of the British Union of Fascists * Charles DeWitt Watts (1917–2004), African American surgeon * Charlie Watts (born 1941), English rock and jazz drummer with The Rolling Stones * Charles Henry Watts II, president of Bucknell University, 1964–76
title: Charles Watts
